column2: AppFolio, Inc. engages in the provision of cloud-based software solutions. The company is headquartered in Goleta, California and currently employs 916 full-time employees. The firm's mobile-optimized software solutions enable its customers to work at any time and from anywhere across multiple devices. Its property management software provides small and medium-sized property managers with an end-to-end solution to their business needs. The firm's legal software provides solo practitioners and small law firms with a streamlined practice and case management solution, allowing them to manage their practices and case load. The company also offers Value+ services, such as its professionally designed Websites and electronic payment services. The firm's property manager customers include third-party managers and owner-operators, managing single- and multi-family residences, commercial property and student housing, as well as mixed real estate portfolios.
